title: Smoked salmon, quinoa & dill lunch pot
contents: This easy packed lunch is as delicious as it is nutritious, with crunchy cucumber and radishes and a herby, creamy dressing

title: Air fryer chicken breasts
contents: Use an air fryer to create this tempting dish of tender chicken breasts coated in garlic, sweet paprika and herbs. Mix up the spices for interest or keep it plain if you prefer

title: Panuozzo sandwich
contents: Make your own baguettes and pesto to make these pizza-inspired sandwiches for the whole family. They're surprisingly quick and easy to make and are great for lunch or a light dinner

title: Bulgur & quinoa lunch bowls
contents: These meal prep grain bowls use one base and two deliciously different toppings. Choose from avocado, olives and rocket or chickpeas, beetroot and orange

title: Falafel burgers
contents: A healthy burger that's filling too. These are great for anyone after a satisfying bite low in calories.

title: Egg & avocado open sandwich
contents: Give your lunch box a moreish makeover - take the ingredients separately and assemble for a fresh and healthy midday meal

title: Turkey, bacon & avocado mini bagels
contents: Pack up a hearty lunch to look forward to - fill bagels with leftover turkey or chicken, crispy bacon and creamy mashed avocado

title: Spicy chicken & avocado wraps
contents: Pan-fry lean chicken breast with lime, chilli and garlic, then pile onto seeded tortilla wraps. Cool before assembling if packing for lunch

title: Chorizo & chickpea soup
contents: Sizzling Chorizo & chickpea soup

title: Prawn & mango salad
contents: Kids will love this colourful salad with avocado and mint - add cold cooked pasta for a more filling packed lunch

title: Egg & rocket pizzas
contents: Use seeded tortillas as pizza bases for a quick and healthy lunch - crack an egg in the centre and bake to boost protein intake

title: Orecchiette with butter beans, parsley, chilli & lemon
contents: Make this simple pasta dish using whatever you’ve got to hand, including different pasta shapes, beans or chopped tomatoes. You can leave out the chilli if you prefer

title: Chicken pesto wrap
contents: Swap soggy sandwiches for tortilla wraps filled with chicken, cheese and veggies in this tasty packed lunch recipe that kids will love

title: Broccoli pasta salad with eggs & sunflower seeds
contents: Pack in protein, carbohydrate and vitamins with this broccoli, pasta and eggs dish, a healthy vegetarian lunch to keep you going on a busy afternoon

title: Healthy beef chow mein
contents: Swap your weekly takeaway for this healthy beef chow mein – it's quick to cook and low in fat and calories

title: Storecupboard pasta salad
contents: This pasta salad makes a quick and healthy lunch, or is perfect prepared ahead for a picnic or lunchbox

title: Ultimate chorizo ciabatta
contents: Crusty ciabatta, spicy chorizo, a generous dollop of pesto and sweet roasted peppers make a moreish combination. Serve warm for a quick supper you'll really enjoy

title: Veggie noodle pot
contents: This noodle salad with sugar snap peas and baby corn makes a great packed lunch for kids - an easy way to get 2 of their 5 a day

title: Chicken kiev quesadilla
contents: A seriously gourmet quesadilla. This easy, chicken-filled snack will curb your cheese cravings – serve warm and golden brown with your favourite dipping sauce

title: Italian sub
contents: Torn mozzarella, salami, sundried tomatoes, balsamic and basil in ciabatta are the ultimate lunch combo
